house_listing.house_description: This split level detached single family home built in 1967 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 2460 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
